subject: jwebunit
msgSnippet: Hello All, I am attempting to write a simple testscripts that connects to a sample application within BEA Weblogic Avitek Medical . I am running into problems
messageBody:
Hello All, I am attempting to write a simple testscripts that
connects to a sample application within BEA Weblogic "Avitek
Medical". I am running into problems with assertTitleEquals, I have
also had other problems with assertLinkPresentWithText() they seems
to work sometimes. The error I receive is as follows

There was 1 failure:
1) testStartPage(Meditek)junit.framework.ComparisonFailure:
expected:<... A WebLogic Server Sample ...> but was:<......>

The name title that I am trying to get does exist.



I have posted the code for assertTitleEquals() problems

mport junit.framework.TestSuite;
import junit.textui.TestRunner;
import net.sourceforge.jwebunit.WebTestCase;
import com.meterware.httpunit.WebRequest;
public class Meditek extends WebTestCase {


public Meditek(String name) {
super(name);
getTestContext().setBaseUrl("http://neptune:7001/");

}

public Meditek() {
super();

}

public void testStartPage(){
beginAt("/");
assertLinkPresentWithText("Start Page");
System.out.println("Start Page link is on the page");
assertTitleEquals("Avitek Medical Record
Application");
System.out.println("Title: Avitek Medical Records
Application");
clickStartPage();



}
public void clickStartPage(){
clickLinkWithText("Start Page");
assertTitleEquals("Avitek Medical Records A WebLogic
Server Sample Application");
assertLinkPresentWithText()
}


public static void main(String[] args) {

TestRunner.run(new TestSuite(Meditek.class));


}

}
